price: We called him from the right side of Mount Tūr [in Sinai] and We brought him near by conversing with him in private.
arabic: وَنَٰدَيۡنَٰهُ مِن جَانِبِ ٱلطُّورِ ٱلۡأَيۡمَنِ وَقَرَّبۡنَٰهُ نَجِيّٗا
